education.institution: Dwarkadas J. Sanghvi College of Engineering

experience.description: Engaged in a structured program focused on building skills in finance and technology. Gained exposure to industry insights through networking with professionals. Collaborating on projects aimed at addressing real-world challenges.

Gained hands-on experience in building machine learning models using Python libraries. Worked on supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms. Applied AI-driven techniques to solve real-world problems.

projects.name: iNotebook
projects.description: Manage user details and notes efficiently with iNotebook, a MERN stack website. Facilitate effortless note management through an intuitive interface that allows users to add, delete, and modify notes. Ensure secure storage and seamless access to user data with a robust backend. Employ the Context API for state management and implement secure login and signup using authentication tokens.

projects.name: NewsMaster
projects.description: Provide users with real-time news updates across various categories using NewsMaster, a React.js website powered by an external news API. Incorporate a sleek top-loading bar for seamless navigation and enable endless news browsing with an infinite scroller. Master the integration of external news APIs to deliver up-to-date information.

projects.name: Google Assistant Clone
projects.description: Create a Google Assistant clone using the Gemini API. Enable users to interact with a virtual assistant that answers questions, provides information, and performs tasks based on user input.

projects.name: Placement System
projects.description: Coordinated project tasks, ensuring adherence to engineering standards and regulations. Conducted comprehensive project analyses, identifying and rectifying discrepancies in engineering designs.

projects.name: Community Hub
projects.description: Developed an inclusive website using Django, providing a vibrant space for blogs, forums, and a marketplace. Facilitated user engagement through diverse discussions and blog sharing. Implemented a marketplace feature to explore various products and services.
